h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Umbral Abyss Location
content: You will get the Spell and be able to use it from the start of Chapter 4. If you are struggling with both of these fights, our detailed boss breakdowns on Yellowbrow and the Macaque Chief can give you some valuable tips to succeed in these final boss fights within Chapter 3.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Umbral_Abyss.md', within the main section titled 'Umbral Abyss', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Umbral Abyss Location'.
The content is as follows:
You will get the Spell and be able to use it from the start of Chapter 4. If you are struggling with both of these fights, our detailed boss breakdowns on Yellowbrow and the Macaque Chief can give you some valuable tips to succeed in these final boss fights within Chapter 3.
